channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2025010840
item.description:
Report X-2025010840

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-21
  • City: COLORADO SPRINGS
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Damaged hazmat was located on workstation 147. 10 other packages were also damaged due to the leaking package containing Zep floor cleaner UN3266 Corrosive liquid, basic, inorganic, n.o.s. SODIUM HYDROXIDE Div: 8 Group: II Weight/Volume: 20.00 LB Label Codes: CORROSIVE the spill was contained and cleaned.
